posts.content: Moved the van out of the garage this morning and everything was fine. Started on the button then moved it onto the drive. I then went to put it back in the garage this evening and when I went to turn the key there was nothing. Checked the battery, Connections,Earth to the battery and fuses and everything looks fine. Never had this problem before. Any suggestions?

When you turned the key was there nothing at all - not even the lights on the speedo came on?
Ignition switch?
Earth lead of the starter motor?

Gertjan
Check the wires to and from the headlight switch. Have had a similar issue and it appears that my switch is dodgy. Switch on sidelights and try turning over the engine.
When this happened to me it turned out to be ignition switch. Was able to give it a wiggle for a while to get a connection but since swapping it out for a new one its been spot on.
